fields.name: Passives:
fields.value:
- Connection: You are randomly assigned a non-King, non-Fool target at the beginning of the game. 
- Reconnect: You may choose 1 new target up until the end of Night 2. [Deactivates D3]

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Holy Protection: Guard! an attack on your target. [Infinite uses, 2 CD]
- Healing Tears: Heal! a player. [3 uses, 1 CD, Astral, Graveyard]
- Soulguard: If your target dies from non-Event causes in this phase, they will live on 1 HP instead, with all status effects still applied. [1 use, Unique, Unlocks D2, Locks D5]

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Your target must survive to see the end of the game, or win within 2 phases of their death. You also win if your target is the last remaining member of their faction (if they are Order/Chaos/Cult).
